recipe.title: Pickled Blackberries
ingredients: 6 tablespoons Champagne vinegar or white wine vinegar
instructions: Combine vinegar, fish sauce, sugar, and 3 Tbsp. water in a jar, screw on lid, and shake vigorously until all sugar is dissolved. Add blackberries and press down to submerge in liquid. Seal jar and chill at least 4 hours.
Do Ahead Blackberries can be pickled 1 month ahead. Keep chilled
Blackberries can be pickled 1 month ahead. Keep chilled
